long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Downloader for Google Chrome: Explore and Download Images Seamlessly

🟦 Image Downloader Extension ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ 
Easily download multiple images at once with our powerful Chrome extension. With Image Downloader, you can:

1.Effortlessly explore and browse images on any webpage
2.Apply filters by width, height, or URL for precise sorting
3.Instantly download or open single images in new tabs with one-click convenience
4.Save images to customized subfolders
5.Rename downloaded files for easy organization
6.Perform background image downloads for uninterrupted browsing
